intro: Agathosma pubescens, commonly known as African Germander, is a flowering plant native to South Africa. It belongs to the family Rutaceae and is characterized by its aromatic, small, yellowish-green flowers. The plant typically grows in rocky or sandy soils and thrives in full sun. Its leaves are often covered in fine hairs, giving it a fuzzy appearance. Agathosma pubescens is valued for its medicinal properties and is used in traditional herbal medicine.
